meanings.definition: Capable of being received or accepted.
meanings.sent1: The package was easily receivable at the front desk.
meanings.sent2: The instructions were clear and receivable by all students.
meanings.sent3: The idea of having a pizza party was very receivable to the students.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was so receivable that it warmed everyone's hearts.
meanings.sent5: The concept of sharing is easily receivable by young children.
